tool_description: Mixes multiple audio tracks with individual volume, pan, and EQ settings to create a balanced stereo mix.

pan_positions.description: Pan positions for each track (-1.0 to 1.0)

error_messages: Empty track list: Provide at least one track name
Too many tracks: Maximum 16 tracks supported
Volume array mismatch: Volume array length must match track count or be omitted
Pan array mismatch: Pan array length must match track count or be omitted
Invalid volume value: All volumes must be between 0.0-1.0
Invalid pan value: All pan values must be between -1.0 and 1.0
Invalid master volume: Must be between 0.0-1.0
usage: Provide track names, optionally specify volumes and pan positions for each track and master volume. Returns mixed audio configuration.

mixed_track_name.description: Name of the resulting mixed track

peak_level.description: Peak level of mixed output (-60.0 to 0.0 dB)
